summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Villa Paris Versioning (STEP 5) and Blocking (STEP 6) features. All core functionality working correctly including version API endpoints, event blocking enforcement, override modal functionality, and Stampa Documenti integration with version creation.
passed_tests: API GET /api/versioni?eventoId=X returns versions list correctly
API POST /api/versioni creates version with complete event snapshot
API GET /api/eventi?id=X includes _blocco info with correct blocking status
API PUT /api/eventi returns 423 Locked for blocked event without override headers
API PUT /api/eventi succeeds with valid override headers (token, motivo, autore)
Banner Blocco visible on modifica-evento page for blocked events (5 days countdown)
Banner Blocco correctly hidden for non-blocked events (41+ days away)
Override modal opens with all required fields (token, motivo, autore)
Override modal validates token correctness (VILLA-PARIS-ADMIN-2026)
Override modal validates motivo length (minimum 10 characters)
Override modal shows validation errors for invalid input
Override modal closes successfully after valid override confirmation
Stampa Documenti button visible and clickable on modifica-evento page
MenuStampa modal opens correctly with watermark selection (BOZZA/CONTRATTO/DEFINITIVO)
PDF generation buttons work for both Cliente and Operativo documents
Form submission blocking works correctly - shows 423 error message for blocked fields
Stampa Cliente creates AUTO_PRE_STAMPA version via API integration
Version API integration working with CONTRATTO/DEFINITIVO watermarks
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Blocked fields (menu, note, disposizioneSala, struttura) properly enforced
Override headers (X-Override-Token, X-Override-Motivo, X-Override-Autore) working correctly

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All versioning and blocking APIs working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All UI components and integrations working perfectly
